alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 1:33PM EDT until April 17 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and forecast through tonight. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river begins. The water level reaches the top of the Abbeville boat ramp and also begins to flood the nearby park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM EDT Saturday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 10.4 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
